languages.text: "Слава Омниссии. Я преклоняю колени пред любимым дитя Его и прошу смиренно принять эту оболочку как дар. Да стану я храмом Машины и вместилищем великого духа ее".
"Praise the Omnissiah. I kneel before His favoured child and humbly offer this shell as a gift. May I become a temple to the machine and a vessel for its great spirit."
languages.original_text: "Слава Омниссии. Я преклоняю колени пред любимым дитя Его и прошу смиренно принять эту оболочку как дар. Да стану я храмом Машины и вместилищем великого духа ее".

traits.locale_text: "Praise the Omnissiah. I kneel before His favoured child and humbly ask to accept this shell as a gift. May I become a temple to the machine and a vessel for its great spirit."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「万機神を讃えよ。私は神の寵児にひざまずき、謹んでこのシェルを捧げる。私が機械の神殿、またその偉大なる精神の船とならんことを」
languages.original_text: "Praise the Omnissiah. I kneel before His favoured child and humbly offer this shell as a gift. May I become a temple to the machine and a vessel for its great spirit."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神を讃えよ。私は神の寵児にひざまずき、謹んでこのシェルを捧げる。私が機械の神殿、またその偉大なる精神の船とならんことを」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “赞美欧姆尼塞亚。我跪在祂心爱的孩子面前，谦卑地将这个躯壳作为礼物奉上。愿我成为机器的殿堂与伟大机魂的容器。”
languages.original_text: "Praise the Omnissiah. I kneel before His favoured child and humbly offer this shell as a gift. May I become a temple to the machine and a vessel for its great spirit."

traits.locale_text: “赞美欧姆尼塞亚。我跪在祂心爱的孩子面前，谦卑地将这个躯壳作为礼物奉上。愿我成为机器的殿堂与伟大机魂的容器。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Gepriesen sei der Omnissiah. Ich knie vor seinem Lieblingskind und biete demütig diese Hülle als Geschenk dar. Möge ich zum Tempel der Maschine und zum Gefäß ihres großen Geists werden."
languages.original_text: "Praise the Omnissiah. I kneel before His favoured child and humbly offer this shell as a gift. May I become a temple to the machine and a vessel for its great spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Gepriesen sei der Omnissiah. Ich knie vor seinem Lieblingskind und biete demütig diese Hülle als Geschenk dar. Möge ich zum Tempel der Maschine und zum Gefäß ihres großen Geists werden."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Loué soit l'Omnimessie. Je m'agenouille devant Son enfant chéri et lui demande humblement d'accepter ce corps en guise d'offrande, afin que je puisse devenir un temple pour la machine et un réceptacle pour son glorieux esprit. »
languages.original_text: "Praise the Omnissiah. I kneel before His favoured child and humbly offer this shell as a gift. May I become a temple to the machine and a vessel for its great spirit."

traits.locale_text: « Loué soit l'Omnimessie. Je m'agenouille devant Son enfant chéri et lui demande humblement d'accepter ce corps en guise d'offrande, afin que je puisse devenir un temple pour la machine et un réceptacle pour son glorieux esprit. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «Alabado sea el Omnissiah. Me postro ante Su hijo predilecto y le ofrezco humildemente este envoltorio terrenal como obsequio; que sirva como templo para la máquina y como avatar para su gran espíritu».
languages.original_text: "Praise the Omnissiah. I kneel before His favoured child and humbly offer this shell as a gift. May I become a temple to the machine and a vessel for its great spirit."

traits.locale_text: «Alabado sea el Omnissiah. Me postro ante Su hijo predilecto y le ofrezco humildemente este envoltorio terrenal como obsequio; que sirva como templo para la máquina y como avatar para su gran espíritu».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Hermesih'e şükürler olsun. İltimaslı çocuğunun önünde diz çöküyor, bu naçizane kabuğu bir armağan olarak sunuyorum. Makineye tapınak, yüce ruhuna konak olayım."
languages.original_text: "Praise the Omnissiah. I kneel before His favoured child and humbly offer this shell as a gift. May I become a temple to the machine and a vessel for its great spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih'e şükürler olsun. İltimaslı çocuğunun önünde diz çöküyor, bu naçizane kabuğu bir armağan olarak sunuyorum. Makine için bir tapınak ve yüce ruhu için bir konak olayım."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
